title: Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson and Anthony Mackie film "Captain Ameri
title_page: Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson and Anthony Mackie film "Captain Ameri
text:
"Captain America: Civil War" stars Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson and Anthony Mackie filmed an action-packed scene in downtown Atlanta on Friday, after filming in Midtown and Buckhead earlier in the week. The project needs extras for a scene to film on Monday. Click here for details.
UPDATES:

Chris Evans' stunt double for "Captain America" lives up to heroic status by handing out water to extras on the set of "Captain America: Civil War." It is filming in downtown Atlanta. PHOTO: Jennifer Brett, jbrett@ajc.com
